vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with FGM Architects, Inc. for architectural and engineering services for the schematic design, design development, construction documents, bidding and negotiation, and construction administration for the construction of the new White Rock Hills Recreation Center located at 2127 and 2165 Highland Road - Not to exceed $1,608,389.19 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund)
vote.description: Authorize a professional services contract with FGM Architects, Inc. for architectural and engineering services for the schematic design, design development, construction documents, bidding and negotiation, and construction administration for the construction of the new White Rock Hills Recreation Center located at 2127 and 2165 Highland Road - Not to exceed $1,608,389.19 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund)
